situation.title: Hand washing
situation.meta_description: Clear instructions of how to wash your hands correctly can be found here.

situation.title: Hand sanitizer
situation.meta_description: You should be able to buy these ingredients in pharmacies or drugstores. These shops are exempt and remain open during the lockdown.

situation.title: Means of transport
situation.meta_description: It is essential to protect yourself and the others while using public transport.

situation.title: Coughing, runny nose
situation.meta_description: Please cover your mouth and your nose. Ideally with a disposable tissue. Please place the used tissue straight into a bin.

situation.title: Room desinfection
situation.meta_description: Please disinfect any surfaces you often use or touch. There is a risk of picking up a virus from a contaminated surface if you touch e.g. your face afterwards.

situation.title: Desinfection of personal belongings
situation.meta_description: Cleaning and disinfecting of subjects that are used by more than one person are part of a broad approach to preventing the spread of coronavirus.
